title: Allows hunters in the county of Chautauqua to hunt bear and deer by the use of a rifle
summary: Allows hunters to use a rifle during open season for deer and bear in the county of Chautauqua south of route 20.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K

                                          801

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  YOUNG  -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the  environmental  conservation  law,  in  relation  to
         allowing  the use of rifles for deer hunting in the county of Chautau-
         qua;

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Item (i) of paragraph a of subdivision 2 of section 11-0907
    2  of the environmental conservation law, as amended by section 11 of chap-
    3  ter 483 of the laws of 2010, is amended to read as follows:

    4  (i) The counties of       Deer, the first Monday  Pistol, shotgun,
    5    Allegany, Cattaraugus,  after November 15       crossbow,
    6    CHAUTAUQUA EXCEPT       through first Tuesday   muzzle loading
    7    THAT PORTION OF         after December 7        firearm, rifle or
    8    THE COUNTY NORTH                                long bow only

   12    Madison,

   16    Steuben,
   17    Tioga and Yates
   18    and that portion of
   19    the county of
   20    Broome east of the
   21    Susquehanna river

   39    S 4. This act shall take effect immediately, provided that the  amend-
   40  ments  to item (i) of paragraph a of subdivision 2 of section 11-0907 of
   41  the environmental conservation law made by section one of this act shall
   42  be subject to the expiration and reversion of such paragraph pursuant to
   43  section 13 of chapter 600 of the laws of 1993,  as  amended,  when  upon
   44  such  date  the provisions of section two of this act shall take effect;
   45  and provided, further, that the amendments to item (i) of paragraph a of
   46  subdivision 2 of section 11-0907 of the environmental  conservation  law

   50  three of this act shall take effect.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to allowing the use of rifles for deer hunting in the county of Chautauqua;
